TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Message extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 提供对定义消息队列消息所需的属性的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the properties needed to define a Message Queuing message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类查看或接收来自队列的消息, 或在将消息发送到队列时对消息属性进行精细控制。Use the class to peek or receive messages from a queue, or to have fine control over message properties when sending a message to a queue. 使用类查看或接收来自队列的消息时, 因为和方法都创建类的新实例并设置该实例的属性。 uses the class when it peeks or receives messages from queues, because both the and methods create a new instance of the class and set the instance's properties. 类的只读属性适用于从队列中检索消息, 而读取/写入属性应用于发送和检索消息。The class's read-only properties apply to retrieving messages from a queue, while the read/write properties apply to sending and retrieving messages. 扫视或接收来自队列的消息时, 其属性将确定检索消息的哪些属性。When peeks or receives a message from a queue, its property determines which of the message's properties are retrieved. 使用类的方法可以为发送到该队列的消息指定任何对象类型。The class's method allows you to specify any object type for a message being sent to that queue. 您可以使用实例的属性来指定发送到队列的一般消息的设置。You can use the instance's property to specify settings for generic messages sent to the queue. 设置类型包括格式化程序、标签、加密和身份验证。The types of settings include formatter, label, encryption, and authentication. 在协调消息传递应用程序以响应确认和报告消息时, 还可以指定相应成员的值。You can also specify values for the appropriate members when you coordinate your messaging application to respond to acknowledgment and report messages. 使用实例将消息发送到队列, 你可以灵活地访问和修改其中的许多属性-无论是单个消息还是按消息。Using a instance to send a message to the queue gives you the flexibility to access and modify many of these properties - either for a single message or on a message-by-message basis. 属性优先于。 properties take precedence over . 消息数据存储在属性中, 并在较小的范围内存储和属性。Message data is stored in the property and to a lesser extent, the and properties. 对消息数据进行加密、序列化或反序列化时, 仅影响属性的内容。When message data is encrypted, serialized, or deserialized, only the contents of the property are affected. 发送消息时, 将使用指定的属性对属性的内容进行序列化。The contents of the property are serialized when the message is sent, using the property you specify. 序列化的内容位于属性中。The serialized contents are found in the property. 您还可以直接设置属性, 例如, 将文件作为消息的数据内容发送。You can also set the property directly, for example, to send a file as the data content of a message. 你可以随时更改或属性, 然后再发送消息, 并且在调用时, 将相应地序列化数据。You can change the or properties at any time before sending the message, and the data will be serialized appropriately when you call . 属性定义的属性仅适用于不属于类型的消息。The properties defined by the property apply only to messages that are not of type . 如果为指定了属性, 则发送到该队列的实例中的名称相同的属性将导致忽略这些默认属性。If you specify the property for a , the identically named properties in a instance sent to that queue cause these default properties to be ignored. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表, 请参见构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用格式化消息正文。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . [!code-cpp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CPP/message_binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CS/message_binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/VB/message_binaryformatter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用格式化消息正文。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . [!code-cpp[Message.Body#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Body/CPP/message_sendreceive.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Body#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Body/CS/message_sendreceive.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Body#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Body/VB/message_sendreceive.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载创建类的新实例, 该实例的正文为空。Use this overload to create a new instance of the class that has an empty body. 发送 对象之前,请指定属性或属性。Specify either the property or the property before sending the object. 属性可以是可序列化的任何对象, 例如文本字符串、结构对象、类实例或嵌入的对象。The property can be any object that can be serialized, such as a text string, a structure object, a class instance, or an embedded object. 除非将消息内容直接写入属性, 否则在发送消息之前, 请设置属性。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 在 实例上调用方法时, 将使用属性的值对正文进行序列化。The body is serialized using the property's value at the time the method is called on the instance. 是松散耦合的, 因此在使用此格式时, 不需要在发送方和接收方上具有相同的对象类型。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 将数据序列化为二进制表示形式。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 在发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`AcknowledgeType.None`| ||`null`| ||00| ||`true`| ||Microsoft 基本加密提供程序版本1。0Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider version 1.0| ||`CryptoProviderType.RSA_FULL`| ||`null`| ||`Stream.null`| ||00| ||`Guid.Empty`| ||空字符串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`EncryptionAlgorithm.RC2`| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`XmlMessageFormatter`| ||`HashAlgorithm.MD5`| ||空字符串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||`MessagePriority.Normal`| ||`false`| ||`null`| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个不同优先级的消息发送到队列, 然后检索它们。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. [!code-cpp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/message_defaultandpriority.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/message_defaultandpriority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/message_defaultandpriority.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载创建类的新实例, 该类包含由`body`参数指定的。Use this overload to create a new instance of the class that contains the specified by the `body` parameter. `body`参数可以是可序列化的任何对象, 例如文本字符串、结构对象、类实例或嵌入的对象。The `body` parameter can be any object that can be serialized, such as a text string, a structure object, a class instance, or an embedded object. 使用来序列化正文, 除非在发送之前 更改属性。The body is serialized using the unless you change the property before the is sent. 如果在调用 之前随时更改或属性, 将根据新的属性值对消息进行序列化。If you change the or property at any time before calling , the message will be serialized according to the new property value. 是松散耦合的, 因此在使用此格式时, 不需要在发送方和接收方上具有相同的对象类型。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 将数据序列化为二进制表示形式。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 在发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`AcknowledgeType.None`| ||`null`| ||00| ||`true`| ||Microsoft 基本加密提供程序版本1。0Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider version 1.0| ||`CryptoProviderType.RSA_FULL`| ||`body` 参数。The `body` parameter.| ||`Stream.null`| ||00| ||`Guid.Empty`| ||空字符串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`EncryptionAlgorithm.RC2`| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`XmlMessageFormatter`| ||`HashAlgorithm.MD5`| ||空字符串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||`MessagePriority.Normal`| ||`false`| ||`null`| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新队列, 将包含订单的消息发送到该队列, 然后检索该队列。The following code example creates a new queue, sends a message that contains an order to it, and then retrieves it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载创建类的新实例, 该类包含由`body`参数指定的, 并使用任何有效的格式化程序来序列化正文。Use this overload to create a new instance of the class that contains the specified by the `body` parameter and that uses any valid formatter to serialize the body. `body`参数是可序列化的任何对象, 例如文本字符串、结构对象、类实例或嵌入的对象。The `body` parameter is any object that can be serialized, such as a text string, a structure object, a class instance, or an embedded object. 如果在调用 之前随时更改或属性, 将根据新的属性值对消息进行序列化。If you change the or property at any time before calling , the message will be serialized according to the new property value. 是松散耦合的, 因此在使用此格式时, 不需要在发送方和接收方上具有相同的对象类型。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 将数据序列化为二进制表示形式。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 在发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`AcknowledgeType.None`| ||`null`| ||00| ||`true`| ||Microsoft 基本加密提供程序版本1。0Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider version 1.0| ||`CryptoProviderType.RSA_FULL`| ||`body` 参数。The `body` parameter.| ||`Stream.null`| ||00| ||`Guid.Empty`| ||空字符串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`EncryptionAlgorithm.RC2`| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`formatter` 参数。The `formatter` parameter.| ||`HashAlgorithm.MD5`| ||空字符串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||`MessagePriority.Normal`| ||`false`| ||`null`| ||长度为零的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ## MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes AcknowledgeType { System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes get(); void set(System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes value); };
member this.AcknowledgeType : System.Messaging.AcknowledgeTypes with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置返回给发送应用程序的确认消息的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of acknowledgment message to be returned to the sending application.

value.span: 值之一，该值表示系统在管理队列中传递的确认消息类型，以及在何种条件下将确认消息返回发送应用程序。

span.span: One of the values, which represent both the types of acknowledgment messages the system posts in the administration queue and the conditions under which acknowledgments are returned to the sending application.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定发送应用程序所请求的确认消息的类型。The property specifies the type of acknowledgment messages requested by the sending application. 在发送消息之前设置属性,以请求特定事件的通知(例如,到达其目标队列的消息、正在检索的消息,或阻止消息到达或检索消息的超时)。目标队列。Set the property before sending the message to request notification of certain occurrences - for example, a message reaching its destination queue, a message being retrieved, or a time-out preventing a message from reaching or being retrieved from the destination queue. 消息队列通过将确认消息发送到原始消息指定的属性来返回通知。Message Queuing returns notification by sending acknowledgment messages to the property specified by the original message. 确认消息的属性指示它所表示的确认类型。An acknowledgment message's property indicates the type of acknowledgment that it represents. 例如, 如果由于消息在间隔过期之前未到达目标而发送确认消息, 确认消息的属性将包含值`ReachQueueTimeout`。For example, if an acknowledgment message was sent because a message did not reach the destination before the interval expired, the property of the acknowledgment message would contain the value `ReachQueueTimeout`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在队列中发送和接收包含订单的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 当原始消息到达或从队列中检索时, 它专门请求肯定确认。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

exception.span: 消息经过筛选后忽略了 属性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Acknowledgment As Acknowledgment
public: property System::Messaging::Acknowledgment Acknowledgment { System::Messaging::Acknowledgment get(); };

summary.span: 获取该消息表示的确认分类。

span.span: Gets the classification of acknowledgment that this message represents.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收来自管理队列的消息时, 请阅读属性以验证原始消息的状态。When you receive a message from an administration queue, read the property to verify the status of the original message. 将消息发送到其目标队列时, 可以请求消息队列发布确认消息。When a message is sent to its destination queue, Message Queuing can be requested to post an acknowledgment message. 例如, 此类消息可以指示消息是在指定的超时内到达, 还是在指定的超时内检索到, 或者指示在传递失败的情况下出现了什么问题。Such a message can indicate, for example, whether the message arrived and was retrieved within specified time-outs, or it can indicate what went wrong in the case of delivery failure. 目标队列返回确认消息, 并将其发送到原始消息的属性中指定的管理队列。The destination queue returns acknowledgment messages and posts them to the administration queue specified in the original message's property. 确认消息的属性标识确认消息, 而不是原始消息。The property of an acknowledgment message identifies the acknowledgment message, not the original message. 可以在确认实例的属性中找到原始消息的标识符。You can find the identifier of the original message in the acknowledgment instance's property. 如果此实例表示确认消息, 则该属性指定确认类型。If this instance represents an acknowledgment message, the property specifies the type of acknowledgment. 否则, 属性包含值`Normal`。Otherwise, the property contains the value `Normal`. 使用原始消息的属性来指定将在哪些情况下返回确认。Use the property of the original message to specify the circumstances under which acknowledgments will be returned.

exception.span: 消息尚未发送。

span.span: The message has not been sent.

span.span: This property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue.
-or-

summary.span: 获取或设置接收由消息队列生成的确认消息的队列。

span.span: Gets or sets the queue that receives the acknowledgement messages that Message Queuing generates.

value.span: ，指定用于系统生成的确认消息的管理队列。

span.span: The that specifies the administration queue used for system-generated acknowledgment messages.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性中指定的队列可以是任何非事务性队列。The queue specified in the property can be any non-transactional queue. 发送到管理队列的确认消息可以指示原始消息是否到达了目标队列，以及是否被从该队列中移除。The acknowledgment messages sent to the administration queue can indicate whether the original message reached its destination queue and whether it was removed from the queue. 当属性具有以外的任何值`None`时, 发送应用程序必须指定要用作管理队列的队列。 When the property has any value other than `None`, the sending application must specify the queue to use as the administration queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在队列中发送和接收包含订单的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 当原始消息到达或从队列中检索时, 它专门请求肯定确认。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

value.span: 应用程序特定的信息。

span.span: Information that is specific to the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含特定于应用程序的信息, 您可以使用这些信息来组织不同类型的消息。The property contains application-specific information that you can use to organize different types of messages. 例如，可使用应用程序特定的索引。For example, you can use application-specific indexes. 应用程序负责解释属性信息。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret property information. 如果可能, 应在消息正文中 (而不是属性) 中包含消息数据。Whenever possible, you should include message data in the body of the message rather than the property. 使用外部队列时, 请使用属性来指定消息队列中不存在的消息属性。When working with foreign queues, use the property to specify message properties that do not exist in Message Queuing. 与属性一样, 应用程序负责了解属性的内容。As with the property, it is the responsibility of the application to understand the content of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个字节数组, 表示发送用户的标识符。The property is an array of bytes that represents the identifier of the sending user. 发件人 ID 由消息队列设置, 接收队列管理器使用该 ID 来验证发送方是否有权访问队列。The sender ID is set by Message Queuing and is used by the receiving Queue Manager to verify whether the sender has access rights to a queue. 缺少发送方 ID 是由发送应用程序指示的, 消息队列不应验证消息的发送方, 也不验证发送方对接收队列的访问权限。The absence of the sender ID is an indication by the sending application that Message Queuing should not validate the message's sender nor verify the sender's access rights to the receiving queue. 仅当消息到达目标队列时已通过身份验证, 才可信任。The is trustworthy only if the message was authenticated when it reached the destination queue. 如果队列仅接受经过身份验证的消息并且 或属性为`false`, 则消息在到达目标队列时被拒绝。The message is rejected when it reaches the destination queue if the queue accepts only authenticated messages and either the or the property is `false`. > [!CAUTION] > 如果消息被拒绝, 则会将其发送到死信队列 (如果为`true`), 否则将被忽略。If a message is rejected, it is either sent to the dead-letter queue (if is `true`), or it is ignored. 如果消息无法到达队列, 可以请求确认。You can request acknowledgments when a message fails to reach a queue. 否则, 如果为`false` , 则消息可能会丢失, 并且不发出警告。Otherwise, when is `false` the message might be lost without warning. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息的属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示消息是否已验证。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the message was authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当应用程序与消息进行交互并尝试确定是否请求身份验证时, 该属性才使用此属性。The property is used only by the application while it is interacting with the message and trying to determine if authentication was requested. 如果消息在队列中, 则会对消息进行身份验证。If the message is in the queue, the message was authenticated. 相反, 如果属性为, `true`则接收队列管理器在收到消息时对消息进行了身份验证。Conversely, if the property is `true`, the receiving Queue Manager authenticated the message when it received that message. 通过查看消息的属性, 不能确定消息是否失败。You cannot determine if a message failed authentication by looking at its properties. 消息队列在将身份验证传递到队列之前, 会丢弃这些消息。Message Queuing discards messages that fail authentication before they are delivered to the queue. 但是, 如果传递失败阻止消息到达队列, 你可以请求发送确认消息。However, you can request that an acknowledgment message be sent if a delivery failure prevents the message from arriving in the queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示消息的属性的值。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用外部队列时 , 通常使用属性来指定与消息关联的加密服务提供程序。You typically use the property when working with foreign queues to specify which cryptographic service provider is associated with a message. 消息队列需要加密提供程序的身份验证提供程序名称和身份验证提供程序类型 (身份验证提供程序) 来验证发送到外部队列的消息的数字签名以及传递给消息的消息从外部队列进行排队。Message Queuing requires the authentication provider name and authentication provider type of the cryptographic provider (authentication provider) to validate the digital signatures of both messages sent to a foreign queue and messages passed to Message Queuing from a foreign queue. 仅`RsaFull`适用于消息传送。Only `RsaFull` is intended to be used with messaging. 发送消息时, 请始终同时设置和属性。When sending a message, always set the and properties together. 发送消息时, 如果未同时设置连接器类型, 则消息队列将忽略身份验证提供程序类型。When the message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the authentication provider type if the connector type is not also set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息的属性通常包含与消息关联的数据。The message's property usually contains the data associated with the message. 尽管你还可以在和属性中发送应用程序特定的数据, 但应尽可能在消息中包含消息数据。Although you can also send application-specific data in the and properties, you should include message data in the of the message whenever possible. 仅对属性内容进行序列化或加密。Only the property contents are serialized or encrypted. 属性可包含任何大小不超过 4 MB 的对象。The property can contain any object whose size does not exceed 4 MB. 如果你使用将不属于类型的任何对象发送到 , 则该对象将位于由或返回的实例的属性中。If you use to send any object that is not of type to the , that object will be located in the property of the instance returned by or . 中`MessageQueue.Send("hello.")`的字符串自变量是此类泛型对象的一个示例。The string argument in `MessageQueue.Send("hello.")` is an example of such a generic object. 属性指示消息正文中存储的信息的类型。The property indicates the type of information that is stored in the message body. 消息队列使用此信息来标识属性内容的类型。Message Queuing uses this information to identify the type of the property contents. 发送 对象之前,请指定属性或属性。Specify either the property or the property before sending the object. 属性可以是任何可序列化对象, 例如文本字符串、结构对象、类实例或嵌入的对象。The property can be any serializable object, such as a text string, structure object, class instance, or embedded object. 除非将消息内容直接写入属性, 否则在发送消息之前, 请设置属性。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 在实例上调用方法时, 使用属性中包含的格式化程序对正文进行序列化。 When the method is called on the instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the property. 如果在未指定属性值的情况下发送消息, 则格式化程序默认为。 If you send the message without specifying a value for the property, the formatter defaults to . > [!NOTE] > 如果`Send`调用类的方法并使用, 则尝试将消息的正文设置为将导致。 Attempting to set the body of a message to will cause a when the `Send` method of the class is called and the is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个不同优先级的消息发送到队列, 然后检索它们。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. summary.span: 获取或设置消息正文中的信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the information in the body of the message.

value.span: ，包含消息的 中包括的已序列化信息。

span.span: A that contains the serialized information included in the of the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息的正文可以包含任何类型的信息 (例如, 字符串、日期、货币、数字、字节数组或任何托管对象)。The body of a message can consist of any type of information - for example, a string, a date, a currency, a number, an array of bytes, or any managed object. 此信息将序列化为要传递到队列的。This information is serialized into a to be passed to the queue. 发送 对象之前,请指定属性或属性。Specify either the property or the property before sending the object. 如果设置了属性, 则会将内容序列化到属性中。If you set the property, the contents are serialized into the property. 不过, 您可以选择直接编写属性。However, you can choose to write the property directly. 这很有用, 例如, 当你想要打开到文件的连接并将其内容流式传输为消息正文时, 这很有用。This is useful, for example, when you want to open a connection to a file and stream its contents as the body of your message. 除非将消息内容直接写入属性, 否则在发送消息之前, 请设置属性。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 在实例上调用方法时, 使用属性中包含的格式化程序对正文进行序列化。 When the method is called on the instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the property. 如果在未指定属性值的情况下发送消息, 则格式化程序默认为。 If you send the message without specifying a value for the property, the formatter defaults to . 如果将此消息正文的`true`属性设置为, 则在发送消息时将加密该消息, 而不是在设置属性时加密。If you set the property to `true` for the body of this message, the message will be encrypted when it is sent, not when you set the property. 因此, 永远不会加密该属性。Therefore, the property is never encrypted.

span.span: This allows a receiving application to interpret message properties that were set by the sending application but that are usually set by Message Queuing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当应用程序设置通常由消息队列设置的消息属性时, 消息队列都需要设置属性。Message Queuing requires the property be set whenever an application sets a message property that is usually set by Message Queuing. 在以下两种情况下, 应用程序通常使用:An application typically uses a in the following two cases: - 每当连接器应用程序传递消息时。Whenever a connector application passes a message. 通知发送和接收应用程序如何解释消息的安全和确认属性。The tells the sending and receiving applications how to interpret the security and acknowledgment properties of the message. - 只要发送应用程序 (而不是消息队列), 就会对消息进行加密。Whenever the sending application, rather than Message Queuing, encrypts a message. 指示消息队列使用属性值对消息进行解密。 The tells Message Queuing to use the property value to decrypt the message. 如果设置以下任何属性, 则必须设置属性 (否则, 在发送消息时, 队列将忽略这些属性):You must set the property if you set any of the following properties (otherwise, the queue ignores these properties when the message is sent): - - - - - -

summary.span: 获取或设置确认、报告和响应消息用以引用原始消息的消息标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the message identifier used by acknowledgment, report, and response messages to reference the original message.

value.span: 原始消息的 属性指定的消息标识符。

span.span: The message identifier specified by the property of the original message.

value.span: 消息队列在生成确认或报告消息时使用相关标识符；而应用程序在生成响应消息时使用相关标识符。

span.span: The correlation identifier is used by Message Queuing when it generates an acknowledgment or report message, and by an application when it generates a response message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当消息队列生成确认或报告消息时, 它使用相关标识符属性来指定原始消息的消息标识符。When Message Queuing generates an acknowledgment or report message, it uses the correlation identifier property to specify the message identifier of the original message. 这样，相关标识符就可将报告或确认消息与原始消息关联起来。In this manner, the correlation identifier ties the report or acknowledgment message to the original message. 然后, 发送应用程序可以通过使用属性标识原始消息的属性, 将确认或报告与原始消息相匹配。The sending application can then match the acknowledgment or report with the original message by using the property to identify the original message's property. 连接器应用程序还必须将确认和报告消息的属性设置为原始消息的消息标识符。Connector applications also must set the property of the acknowledgment and report messages to the message identifier of the original message. 当应用程序将响应消息发送到发送应用程序时, 可以将响应消息的属性设置为原始消息的消息标识符。When your application sends a response message to the sending application, you can set the property of the response message to the message identifier of the original message. 然后, 发送应用程序可以将响应消息与发送的消息相匹配。The sending application can then match your response message to the message that was sent. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在队列中发送和接收包含订单的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 当原始消息到达或从队列中检索时, 它专门请求肯定确认。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个方案要求使用属性。Two scenarios require you to use the property. 第一种情况是, 应用程序 (而不是消息队列) 会对消息进行加密。The first is when your application, rather than Message Queuing, encrypts a message. 第二种情况是将加密消息发送到消息队列之外的队列系统。The second is when you send an encrypted message to a queuing system other than Message Queuing. 在设置此属性之前, 必须用接收队列管理器的公钥来加密对称密钥。Before you set this property, you must encrypt the symmetric key with the public key of the receiving queue manager. 发送应用程序加密的消息时, 接收队列管理器使用对称密钥对消息进行解密, 然后将消息发送到目标队列。When you send an application-encrypted message, the receiving queue manager uses the symmetric key to decrypt the message before sending it to its destination queue. 如果将消息发送到外部队列, 则相应的连接器应用程序将首先收到该消息, 该应用程序会将加密的消息连同附加的对称密钥转发给接收应用程序。If you send a message to a foreign queue, the message is first received by the appropriate connector application, which forwards the encrypted message with the attached symmetric key to the receiving application. 然后, 接收应用程序负责使用对称密钥对消息进行解密。It is then the responsibility of the receiving application to decrypt the message using the symmetric key. 设置属性时, 还必须设置属性。When you set the property, you must also set the property. 发送消息时, 如果还未设置该 属性, 则消息队列将忽略该属性。When the message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the property if the property is not also set. 属性的最大数组大小为256。The property has a maximum array size of 256.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息队列用于验证消息的数字签名。

span.span: Gets or sets the digital signature that Message Queuing uses to authenticate the message.

value.span: 字节值的数组，指定用于对消息进行身份验证的消息队列 1.0 数字签名。

span.span: An array of byte values that specifies the Message Queuing 1.0 digital signature used to authenticate the message.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的数组。

span.span: The default is a zero-length array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列在对消息队列版本1.0 发送的消息进行身份验证时使用数字签名。Message Queuing uses the digital signature when authenticating messages that were sent by Message Queuing version 1.0. 在大多数情况下, 消息队列在发送应用程序请求身份验证时生成并设置属性。In most cases, Message Queuing generates and sets the property when the sending application requests authentication. 接收应用程序使用此属性来检索附加到消息的数字签名。The receiving application uses this property to retrieve the digital signature attached to the message. 在运行消息队列版本 2.0 时, 只能使用属性。You can only use the property when running Message Queuing version 2.0. 在请求身份验证时, 发送应用程序必须指定消息队列版本1.0 签名。The sending application must specify Message Queuing version 1.0 signatures when requesting authentication. 如果发送应用程序发送消息队列版本2.0 签名, 则此属性包含四个字节 (每个字节都包含零) 的缓冲区。If the sending application sends a Message Queuing version 2.0 signature, this property contains a buffer of four bytes, each containing zero. 发送消息时, 连接器应用程序也使用属性和属性。The property, together with the property, is also used by connector applications when a message is sent. 在此方案中, 连接器应用程序 (而不是消息队列) 生成数字签名, 它基于发送消息的用户的证书。In this scenario, the connector application - rather than Message Queuing - generates the digital signature, which it bases on the certificate of the user sending the message. 属性的最大数组大小为256。The property has a maximum array size of 256. 设置属性时, 还必须设置属性。When you set the property, you must also set the property. 发送消息时, 如果还未设置该 属性, 则消息队列将忽略该属性。When a message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the property if the property is not also set.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于加密私有消息体的加密算法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息是专用的 (加密的), 则会在收到消息之前对其进行加密。If a message is private (encrypted), it is encrypted before it is sent and decrypted upon receipt. 属性指定用于对专用消息的消息正文进行加密的算法。The property specifies the algorithm used to encrypt the message body of a private message. 队列可能要求对传入消息进行加密。A queue can require that incoming messages be encrypted. 如果应用程序将非加密 (非专用) 消息发送到只接受专用消息的队列, 或将专用消息发送到只接受非私有消息的队列, 则队列将拒绝该消息。If an application sends a non-encrypted (non-private) message to a queue that accepts only private messages, or if it sends a private message to a queue that accepts only non-private messages, the queue rejects the message. 发送应用程序可以请求在这种情况下返回否定确认消息。The sending application can request that a negative acknowledgment message be returned in such a case.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于将对象序列化到消息体中，或从消息体中反序列化对象的格式化程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatter used to serialize an object into or deserialize an object from the message body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在读取和写入消息时使用属性。Use the property when reading and writing a message. 将消息发送到队列时, 格式化程序会将属性序列化为可发送到消息队列的流。When a message is sent to the queue, the formatter serializes the property into a stream that can be sent to the message queue. 从队列中进行读取时, 格式化程序将消息数据反序列化为属性。When reading from a queue, the formatter deserializes the message data into the property. 除非将消息内容直接写入属性, 否则在发送消息之前, 请设置属性。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 在实例上调用方法时, 使用属性中包含的格式化程序对正文进行序列化。 When the method is called on the instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the property. 如果在未指定属性值的情况下发送消息, 则格式化程序默认为。 If you send the message without specifying a value for the property, the formatter defaults to . 是松散耦合的, 因此在使用此格式时, 不需要在发送方和接收方上具有相同的对象类型。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 将数据序列化为二进制表示形式。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 在发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用格式化消息正文。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . [!code-cpp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CPP/message_binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CS/message_binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/VB/message_binaryformatter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用格式化消息正文。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . remarks.format: ## Remarks 在源计算机上, 消息队列在为消息创建数字签名时使用哈希算法。On the source computer, Message Queuing uses the hashing algorithm when creating a digital signature for a message. 然后, 目标队列管理器使用相同的哈希算法在收到消息时对消息进行身份验证。The target Queue Manager then uses the same hashing algorithm to authenticate the message when it is received. 由于 MD5 和 SHA1 出现冲突, Microsoft 建议 SHA256。Due to collision problems with MD5 and SHA1, Microsoft recommends SHA256.

summary.span: 获取消息的标识符。

span.span: Gets the message's identifier.

value.span: 消息的唯一标识符，由消息队列生成。

span.span: The message's unique identifier, which is generated by Message Queuing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送消息时, 消息队列会生成消息标识符。Message Queuing generates a message identifier when the message is sent. 标识符由20个字节组成, 其中包含两个项: 发送计算机的计算机和计算机上消息的唯一标识符。The identifier is composed of 20 bytes and includes two items: the machine of the sending computer and a unique identifier for the message on the computer. 这两项组合在一起，就产生了一个在网络上唯一的消息标识符。The combination of the two items produces a message identifier that is unique on the network. 消息队列为所有消息 (包括确认消息和报告消息) 生成消息标识符。Message Queuing generates message identifiers for all messages - including acknowledgment and report messages. 确认消息通常由消息队列发送, 以反映原始消息的到达或失败。An acknowledgment message is generally sent by Message Queuing in reaction to the arrival or failure of an original, sent message. 可以在确认消息的属性中找到原始消息的属性值。You can find the property value of the original message in the property of an acknowledgment message. 将响应消息发送到响应队列时, 还可以使用属性。You can also use the property when sending a response message to a response queue. 若要在响应消息中包含原始消息的标识符, 请将响应消息的属性设置为原始消息的属性。To include the identifier of the original message in a response message, set the property of the response message to the property of the original message. 然后, 读取响应消息的应用程序可以使用响应消息的相关标识符来标识原始消息。The application reading the response message can then use the correlation identifier of the response message to identify the original message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在队列中发送和接收包含订单的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 当原始消息到达或从队列中检索时, 它专门请求肯定确认。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和需要一个指定超时值的值。对于前一种情况, 超时是指从队列中接收消息所允许的最长时间。 and require a value that specifies a time-out. For the former, the time-out is the maximum time allowed for a message to be received from the queue. 对于后一种情况, 超时是指允许消息到达队列的时间。For the latter, the time-out is the time allowed for a message to reach the queue. 在这两种情况下, 可以指定超时值 (以秒为单位), 也可以使用指示不存在超时。In both cases, you can specify the time-out as a number of seconds or use to indicate that no time-out exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用字段。The following code example demonstrates the use of the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收应用程序使用属性来验证消息是否是在单个事务中发送到单个队列的第一条消息。Receiving applications use the property to verify that a message was the first message sent in a single transaction to a single queue. 此属性仅适用于消息队列版本2.0 及更高版本。This property is available only with Message Queuing version 2.0 and later. 若要验证事务边界, 可以结合使用属性和两个其他属性: 和。To verify transaction boundaries, you can use the property along with two other properties: and . 使用前者检查消息是否是事务中发送的最后一条消息, 并使用后者来检索事务的标识符。Use the former to check whether a message was the last message sent in the transaction, and use the latter to retrieve the identifier of the transaction. 如果在事务中只发送一条消息, 则和属性都设置为`true`。If only one message is sent in a transaction, the and properties are both set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示消息的属性的值。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息标签有多种用途。You can use a message label for several purposes. 例如，可用于显示消息，或根据标签值有选择地处理消息。For example, you can use it for display purposes or to selectively process messages based on the label value. 此标签在消息中不必是唯一的。The label does not need to be unique across messages. 消息队列和消息标签表示一个应用程序定义的值，可利用该值将标识队列或消息用人可识别的词条标识出来。Message queue and message labels represent an application-defined value that can help identify the queue or message in human-readable terms. 应用程序负责解释标签内容, 这对 "消息队列" 应用程序没有内部意义。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret the label contents, which have no intrinsic meaning to the Message Queuing application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息的属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

public: property long LookupId { long get(); };

summary.span: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中引入。

span.span: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.

summary.span: 获取消息的查找标识符。

span.span: Gets the message's lookup identifier.

value.span: 消息的查找标识符，由消息队列生成，对消息驻留的队列是唯一的。

span.span: The message's lookup identifier, which is generated by Message Queuing and is unique to the queue where the message resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对消息查找标识符的只读访问。The property provides read-only access to a message's lookup identifier. MSMQ 3.0 中引入的查找标识符是一个64位标识符, 由消息队列生成并在消息放入队列中时分配给每个消息。The lookup identifier, introduced in MSMQ 3.0, is a 64-bit identifier that is generated by Message Queuing and assigned to each message when the message is placed in the queue. 查找标识符不同于发送消息时生成的消息标识符。The lookup identifier is not the same as the message identifier that is generated when the message is sent. 消息队列为放置在任何队列中的所有消息生成一个查找标识符, 包括应用程序生成的目标、管理和报表队列, 以及系统生成的日志、死信、连接器和传出队列。Message Queuing generates a lookup identifier for all messages that are placed in any queue, including application-generated destination, administration, and report queues, as well as system-generated journal, dead-letter, connector, and outgoing queues. 换句话说, 这包括通过发送应用程序和消息队列发送的消息。In other words, this includes both messages sent by sending applications and by Message Queuing. 查找标识符对于队列是唯一的, 在队列外没有意义。The lookup identifier is unique to the queue and has no meaning outside the queue. 如果将一条消息发送到多个目标队列, 或将消息的副本存储在计算机日志或队列日志中, 则该消息的每个副本都将具有自己的查找标识符, 同时将其放入各自的队列中。If a message is sent to several destination queues, or if a copy of a message is stored in a computer journal or queue journal, each copy of the message will have its own lookup identifier when it is placed in its respective queue. 仅可对从队列中检索到的消息读取属性。The property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue. 查找标识符用于读取队列中的特定消息。A lookup identifier is used to read a specific message in the queue. 已知消息的查找标识符后, 接收方应用程序可以调用或函数直接进入该消息, 并从队列中查看或检索该消息, 这不同于必须从队列前面启动的游标,导航到队列的末尾,Once the lookup identifier of a message is known, the receiving application can call the or function to go directly to that message and peek at or retrieve it from the queue, unlike cursors that must start at the front of the queue and navigate towards the end of the queue, 获取队列中消息的查找标识符是应用程序的责任。Obtaining the lookup identifiers of the messages in the queue is the responsibility of the application. 获取查找标识符的一种可行方法是为目标队列创建一个触发器, 以便在将每条消息放置到队列中时调用该组件来缓存每个消息的标识符。One possible way to obtain the lookup identifiers is to create a trigger for the destination queue that invokes a component that caches the identifiers of each message as they are placed in the queue.

summary.span: 获取消息类型：、 或 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列通常在发送消息时设置此属性。Message Queuing typically sets this property when it sends the message. 消息队列消息可以是下列类型之一：A Message Queuing message can be one of the following types: - `Normal`, 它是从应用程序发送到队列的典型消息, 或返回给发送应用程序的响应消息。`Normal`, which is either a typical message sent from an application to a queue, or a response message returned to the sending application. - `Acknowledgement`, 在发送应用程序请求消息时, 将生成消息队列。`Acknowledgement`, which Message Queuing generates whenever the sending application requests one. 例如，消息队列可生成肯定消息或否定消息，以指示原始消息已到达或已被读取。For example, Message Queuing can generate positive or negative messages to indicate that the original message arrived or was read. 消息队列会将相应的确认消息返回到发送应用程序所指定的管理队列。Message Queuing returns the appropriate acknowledgment message to the administration queue specified by the sending application. - `Report`, 只要在源队列管理器中定义了报表队列, 消息队列就会生成。`Report`, which Message Queuing generates whenever a report queue is defined at the source Queue Manager. 如果启用了跟踪，则每当原始消息进入或离开消息队列服务器时，消息队列都会向消息队列报告队列发送报告消息。When tracing is enabled, Message Queuing sends a report message to the Message Queuing report queue each time the original message enters or leaves a Message Queuing server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示消息的属性的值。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息优先级，该优先级用于确定消息在队列中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the message priority, which determines where in the queue the message is placed.

value.span: 值之一，表示非事务性消息的优先级。

span.span: One of the values, which represent the priority levels of non-transactional messages.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会影响消息队列在消息传送过程中以及到达其目标后如何处理消息。The property affects how Message Queuing handles the message both while it is en route and once it reaches its destination. 在路由过程中，优先级高的消息具有优先权，将会插入到目标队列的队首。Higher-priority messages are given preference during routing and inserted toward the front of the destination queue. 而具有相同优先级的消息则会按照到达的先后时间插入到队列中。Messages with the same priority are placed in the queue according to their arrival time. 只能为非事务性消息设置有意义的优先级。You can set a meaningful priority only for non-transactional messages. 消息队列会将事务性消息的优先级自动设置`Lowest`为, 从而导致忽略事务性消息的优先级。Message Queuing automatically sets the priority for transactional messages to `Lowest`, which causes transactional message priority to be ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个不同优先级的消息发送到队列, 然后检索它们。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. [!code-cpp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/message_defaultandpriority.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/message_defaultandpriority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/message_defaultandpriority.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在出现计算机故障或网络问题时是否保证传递消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message is guaranteed to be delivered in the event of a computer failure or network problem.

value.span: 如果通过在消息传递过程中将消息保存到磁盘上来保证消息的传递，则为 ；如果不能保证传递，则为 。

span.span: if delivery of the message is guaranteed (through saving the message to disk while en route); if delivery is not assured.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示消息的传递是否得到保证, 即使在消息发送到目标队列的过程中出现计算机崩溃。The property indicates whether the delivery of a message is guaranteed - even if a computer crashes while the message is en route to the destination queue. 如果保证消息的传递, 则会在路由过程中的每个步骤本地存储消息, 直到将消息成功转发到下一台计算机。If delivery of a message is guaranteed, the message is stored locally at every step along the route, until the message is successfully forwarded to the next computer. 将属性设置为`true`可能会影响吞吐量。 Setting the property to `true` could affect throughput. 如果消息是事务性的, 消息队列会自动将消息视为可恢复消息, 而不考虑属性的值。If the message is transactional, Message Queuing automatically treats the message as recoverable, regardless of the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息的属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识接收应用程序生成的响应消息的队列, 接收方应用程序将该消息返回给发送应用程序。The property identifies the queue that receives application-generated response messages, which the receiving application returns to the sending application. 当应用程序发送其消息时，发送应用程序会指定响应队列。The sending application specifies response queues when the application sends its messages. 任何可用队列均可指定为响应队列。Any available queue can be specified as a response queue. 返回到响应队列的消息是应用程序特定的。Messages returned to the response queue are application-specific. 应用程序必须定义消息的内容以及收到消息时采取的操作。The application must define the contents of the messages as well as the action to take upon receipt of a message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息的属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证消息的安全证书。

span.span: Gets or sets the security certificate used to authenticate messages.

value.span: 表示安全证书的字节值数组，消息队列用该数组验证消息的发送方。

span.span: An array of byte values that represents a security certificate, which Message Queuing uses to verify the sender of the message.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的数组。

span.span: The default is a zero-length array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当消息包含外部安全证书时, 接收应用程序将使用属性。The receiving application uses the property when the message includes an external security certificate. 消息队列可以使用内部或外部安全证书对消息进行身份验证。Message Queuing can authenticate a message using either an internal or external security certificate. 消息队列提供用于验证消息完整性的内部证书。Message Queuing provides internal certificates, which are used to verify message integrity. 证书颁发机构提供外部证书, 可通过消息的属性访问该证书。A certification authority provides an external certificate, which you can access through the property of the message. 除了允许消息队列对消息进行身份验证外, 外部证书还允许接收应用程序进一步验证发送方。In addition to allowing Message Queuing to authenticate the message, an external certificate allows the receiving application to further verify the sender. 内部证书对于接收应用程序没有可用的值。An internal certificate has no usable value to a receiving application. 必须向消息队列系统的目录服务注册外部证书。An external certificate must be registered with the directory service of the Message Queuing system. 外部证书包含有关证书颁发机构、证书用户、证书有效期、证书用户公钥和证书颁发机构签名的信息。An external certificate contains information about the certification authority, the certificate user, the validity period of the certificate, the public key of the certificate user, and the certification authority's signature.

summary.span: 获取发送用户的标识符。

span.span: Gets the identifier of the sending user.

value.span: 标识发送方的字节值数组。

span.span: An array of byte values that identifies the sender.

value.span: 接收队列管理器在对消息进行身份验证时使用标识符 — 以验证消息的发送方和发送方对队列的访问权限。

span.span: The receiving Queue Manager uses the identifier when it authenticates the message to verify the sender of the message and the sender's access rights to the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性为`false`, 则在发送时, 属性中指定的发送方标识符不会附加到消息中。 If the property is `false`, the sender identifier specified in the property is not attached to the message when it is sent. 这会指示消息队列, 指出发送方在向目标队列发送消息时不应验证发送方。This indicates to Message Queuing that the sender should not be validated when it sends the message to the destination queue. 如果属性为`true`, 则只有在对消息进行身份验证时, 属性值才是可信任的。 If the property is `true`, the property value is trustworthy only if the message was authenticated. 将属性与属性结合使用, 验证发件人的访问权限。Use the property in conjunction with the property to verify the sender's access rights. 连接器应用程序是一种应用程序, 它使用连接器服务器来提供消息队列与其他队列系统之间的通信。A connector application is an application that uses a connector server to provide communication between Message Queuing and other queuing systems. 消息队列需要连接器应用程序来提供发送程序标识。Message Queuing requires connector applications to provide sender identification. 通过连接器应用程序发送消息时, 必须设置属性。You must set the property when sending a message through a connector application.

summary.span: 获取或设置要从目标队列接收消息所需的最长时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time for the message to be received from the destination queue.

value.span: 从目标队列接收已发送消息所需的总时间。

span.span: The total time for a sent message to be received from the destination queue.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定从目标队列接收发送消息所用的总时间。The property specifies the total time for a sent message to be received from the destination queue. 时间限制包括获取目标队列所用的时间, 以及在接收消息之前在队列中等待的时间。The time limit includes the time spent getting to the destination queue and the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is received. > [!CAUTION] > 使用从属客户端计算机时, 请确保客户端计算机上的时钟与运行消息队列的服务器上的时钟同步。When using dependent client computers, be sure the clock on the client computer is synchronized with the clock on the server that is running Message Queuing. 否则, 如果发送的消息的属性不是, 则可能导致不可预知的行为。Otherwise, unpredictable behavior might result when sending a message whose property is not . 如果从队列中删除消息之前, 由属性指定的间隔过期, 则消息队列将以两种方式之一丢弃该消息。If the interval specified by the property expires before the message is removed from the queue, Message Queuing discards the message in one of two ways. 如果消息的 属性为 `true`，则将该消息发送到死信队列。If the message's property is `true`, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果 为`false`, 则忽略该消息。If is `false`, the message is ignored. 如果在计时器过期之前未检索到消息, 则可以设置消息的属性以请求消息队列向发送应用程序发送否定确认消息。You can set the message's property to request that Message Queuing send a negative acknowledgment message back to the sending application if the message is not retrieved before the timer expires. 如果由属性指定的值小于属性指定的值, 则优先使用。If the value specified by the property is less than the value specified by the property, takes precedence. 在单个事务中发送多个消息时, 消息队列将使用第一条消息的属性。When several messages are sent in a single transaction, Message Queuing uses the property of the first message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息的属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果由属性指定的时间间隔在消息到达其目标之前过期, 则消息队列将通过以下两种方式之一丢弃消息。If the interval specified by the property expires before the message reaches its destination, Message Queuing discards the message in one of two ways. 如果消息的 属性为 `true`，则将该消息发送到死信队列。If the message's property is `true`, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果 为`false`, 则忽略消息If is `false`, the message is ignored 如果消息不会在计时器过期前到达, 则可以设置该消息的属性, 请求消息队列向发送应用程序发送否定确认消息。You can set he message's property to request that Message Queuing send a negative acknowledgment message back to the sending application if the message does not arrive before the timer expires. 如果该属性设置为0秒, 则消息队列将尝试将消息发送到其目标-如果队列正在等待消息。If the property is set to 0 seconds, Message Queuing tries once to send the message to its destination - if the queue is waiting for the message. 如果队列是本地的, 则消息始终到达该队列。If the queue is local, the message always reaches it. 如果由属性指定的值大于属性指定的值, 则优先使用。If the value specified by the property is greater than the value specified by the property, takes precedence. 在单个事务中发送多个消息时, 消息队列将使用第一条消息的属性。When several messages are sent in a single transaction, Message Queuing uses the property of the first message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息的属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

summary.span: 获取曾包含消息的事务的标识符。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the transaction of which the message was a part.

value.span: 与消息关联的事务的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the transaction associated with the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收应用程序使用属性来验证消息是否是作为特定事务的一部分发送的。Receiving applications use the property to verify that a message was sent as part of a specific transaction. 事务标识符包含发送计算机的标识符 (前16位), 后跟4个字节的事务序列号。The transaction identifier contains the identifier of the sending computer (first 16 bits) followed by a 4-byte transaction sequence number. 此属性仅适用于消息队列版本2.0 及更高版本。This property is available only for Message Queuing version 2.0 and later. 事务标识符不一定是唯一的, 因为事务序列号不是持久的, 它们会在 2 20重新开始。Transaction identifiers are not guaranteed to be unique, because transaction sequence numbers are not persistent, and they start over again at 2 20. 消息队列仅保证后续事务具有不同的事务序列号。Message Queuing guarantees only that subsequent transactions will have different transaction sequence numbers. 可以结合使用属性和和属性来验证事务边界。You can use the property along with the and properties to verify transaction boundaries. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示消息的属性的值。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

summary.span: 获取源计算机中的事务状态队列。

span.span: Gets the transaction status queue on the source computer.

value.span: 源计算机中的事务状态队列，用于将确认消息发回发送应用程序。

span.span: The transaction status queue on the source computer, which is used for sending acknowledgement messages back to the sending application.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识源计算机上的事务队列, 该队列接收来自连接器应用程序的已读回执确认。The property identifies the transactional queue on the source computer that receives read-receipt acknowledgments from connector applications. 消息队列在检索发送到外部队列的事务性消息时, 将设置属性和连接器应用程序使用属性。Message Queuing sets the property, and connector applications use the property when retrieving transactional messages sent to foreign queues. 在非 Microsoft 消息队列的队列系统中存在一个外部队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. 消息队列通过连接器应用程序与此类队列通信。Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. 连接器应用程序可以使用事务状态队列向发送应用程序发送确认消息。The connector application can use the transaction status queue to send acknowledgment messages back to the sending application. 即使发送应用程序未请求其他确认, 事务状态队列也应该接收这些确认。The transaction status queue should receive these acknowledgments even if the sending application does not request other acknowledgments. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示消息的属性的值。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

member this.UseAuthentication : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示消息发送前是否验证了（或是否必须验证）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message was (or must be) authenticated before being sent.

value.span: 如果发送应用程序请求对消息进行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the sending application requested authentication for the message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定是否需要对消息进行身份验证。The property specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated. 如果发送应用程序请求身份验证, 则消息队列会创建数字签名, 并使用它在发送消息时对消息进行签名, 并在收到消息时对消息进行身份验证。If the sending application requests authentication, Message Queuing creates a digital signature and uses it to sign the message when it is sent and authenticate the message when it is received. 如果 为`false`并且向只接受经过身份验证的消息的队列发送消息, 则在消息到达队列时将拒绝该消息。If is `false` and a message is sent to a queue that accepts only authenticated messages, the message will be rejected when it reaches the queue. 通过查看消息的属性, 不能确定消息是否失败。You cannot determine if a message failed authentication by looking at its properties. 消息队列在传递到队列之前会丢弃此类消息。Message Queuing discards such messages before they are delivered to the queue. 但是, 如果传递失败阻止消息到达队列, 则可以请求发送确认消息。However, you can request that an acknowledgment message be sent if a delivery failure prevents a message from arriving in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseDeadLetterQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将未能传递的消息的副本发送到死信队列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a copy of the message that could not be delivered should be sent to a dead-letter queue.

value.span: 如果消息传递失败应导致向死信队列发送消息的副本，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if message-delivery failure should result in a copy of the message being sent to a dead-letter queue; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性指定消息队列跟踪消息的方式。The and properties specify how Message Queuing tracks a message. 如果为`true`, 则传递失败 (对于非事务性消息) 将导致消息发送到无法传递消息的计算机上的非事务性死信队列。If is `true`, delivery failure (of a non-transactional message), causes the message to be sent to the non-transactional dead-letter queue on the computer that could not deliver the message. 例如, 消息计时器过期可能会导致传递失败。Delivery failure could be caused by a message timer expiring, for example. 如果事务消息传递失败, 则消息队列会在所有负面和有疑问的情况下将消息发送到源计算机上的事务性死信队列。In the case of delivery failure for a transactional message, Message Queuing sends the message to the transactional dead-letter queue on the source machine in all negative and in-doubt cases. 将消息存储在死信队列中时, 应定期清除队列, 以删除不再需要的消息。When you store messages in a dead-letter queue, you should clear the queue periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 死信队列中存储的消息会根据队列所在计算机的大小配额计数。Messages stored in dead-letter queues count against the size quota for the computer where the queue resides. 计算机配额由管理员设置, 是指为在整个计算机上存储消息而不只是在单个队列中分配的大小。The computer quota is set by the administrator and refers to the size allocated for storing messages on the whole computer, not just in a single queue. 不创建日志或死信队列。You do not create a journal or dead-letter queue. 这两个都是消息队列生成的系统队列。These are both system queues that Message Queuing generates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息的属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

value.span: 要求消息队列加密消息时为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to require Message Queuing to encrypt the message; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息是私有的, 则在发送和解密消息时, 消息的正文会被加密。If a message is private, its body is encrypted before it is sent and decrypted when it is received. 若要发送专用消息, 发送应用程序必须指定使用加密, 并根据需要指定加密算法。To send a private message, the sending application must specify that encryption be used and, optionally, the encryption algorithm. 发送专用消息时, 应用程序不需要执行消息加密。When sending private messages, your application does not need to perform the message encryption. 如果你的应用程序在 Microsoft Windows 2000 企业内发送消息, 并且该企业有权访问目录服务, 则消息队列可以为你加密消息正文。Message Queuing can encrypt the message body for you if your application is sending messages within a Microsoft Windows 2000 enterprise, which has access to the directory service. 接收专用消息时, 接收队列管理器始终会解密消息正文。When receiving private messages, the receiving Queue Manager always decrypts the message body. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息的属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

member this.UseJournalQueue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在始发计算机的计算机日记中保留消息的副本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a copy of the message should be kept in a machine journal on the originating computer.

value.span: 在成功地将消息从始发计算机传输到下一个服务器后，要求在始发计算机的计算机日记中保留消息副本时为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to require that a copy of a message be kept in the originating computer's machine journal after the message has been successfully transmitted (from the originating computer to the next server); otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性指定消息队列跟踪消息的方式。The and properties specify how Message Queuing tracks a message. 如果 为`true`, 则在传输消息的每个步骤中, 将副本保存在原始计算机上的计算机日志中。If is `true`, then a copy is kept in the computer journal on the originating machine at each step that a message is transmitted. 如果目标队列位于远程计算机上, 则仅将发送的消息复制到日记队列。The sent message is only copied to the journal queue if the destination queue is on a remote computer. 如果目标在本地计算机上, 则该消息将直接发送到队列;无需执行日记操作的中间步骤。If the destination is on the local computer, the message is sent directly to the queue; there are no intermediate steps to require journaling. 在日志队列中存储消息时, 请定期清除队列, 以删除不再需要的消息。When you store messages in a journal queue, clear the queue periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 日志队列中存储的消息会根据队列所在的计算机的配额计数。Messages stored in journal queues count against the quota for the computer where the queue resides. (计算机配额由管理员设置。)(The computer quota is set by the administrator.) 不创建日志或死信队列。You do not create a journal or dead-letter queue. 这两个都是消息队列生成的系统队列。These are both system queues that Message Queuing generates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息的属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在消息向目标队列移动的过程中跟踪消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to trace a message as it moves toward its destination queue.

value.span: 如果在发往目标队列的过程中，由原始消息产生的每个中间步骤都生成发送给系统报告队列的报告，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if each intermediate step made by the original message en route to the destination queue generates a report to be sent to the system's report queue; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定在消息到达目标队列时是否跟踪该消息的路由。The property specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue. 如果`true`为, 则每次消息通过消息队列路由服务器时, 报表消息 (由消息队列生成) 都将发送到报表队列。If `true`, a report message (generated by Message Queuing) is sent to a report queue each time the message passes through a Message Queuing routing server. 报表队列由源队列管理器指定。The report queue is specified by the source Queue Manager. 报表队列并不限于消息队列生成的报表消息;还可以将应用程序生成的消息发送到报表队列。Report queues are not limited to report messages generated by Message Queuing; your application-generated messages can also be sent to report queues. 使用跟踪涉及到设置 Active Directory 和为消息队列企业指定报表队列。Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise. 管理员配置这些设置。The administrator configures these settings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取并设置消息的属性的值。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.
